entry.title: WIND WARNING, Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-la-Madeleine 12:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: SSE 28 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
